title: UK Reform Leader Speech Interrupted By Banner Mocking Putin Views
content: A speech being delivered by Nigel Farage, the leader of Britain's right-wing Reform UK party, was interrupted late Saturday when a banner of Russian President Vladimir Putin descended from the ceiling at an election rally.
summary: A speech being delivered by Nigel Farage, the leader of Britain's right-wing Reform UK party, was interrupted late Saturday when a banner of Russian President Vladimir Putin descended from the ceiling at an election rally.

title: Explained: What Is France's Snap Election, How Does It Work, What Next
content: France holds the first round of parliamentary elections on Sunday. Opinion polls show the far right could win the two-round legislative vote that concludes on July 7.
summary: France holds the first round of parliamentary elections on Sunday. Opinion polls show the far right could win the two-round legislative vote that concludes on July 7.

title: North Korean Officials Wear Pins With "Friendly Father" Kim Jong Un's Face
content: North Korean officials wore pins with a portrait of Kim Jong Un in public for the first time in pictures released by state media on Sunday, the latest step in the development of a cult of personality about the leader.
summary: North Korean officials wore pins with a portrait of Kim Jong Un in public for the first time in pictures released by state media on Sunday, the latest step in the development of a cult of personality about the leader.

title: Rishi Sunak "Hurt" After Right-Wing Party Calls Him "Paki"
content: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak expressed his anger following a racist slur directed at him by a supporter of Nigel Farage's right-wing Reform UK party.
summary: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak expressed his anger following a racist slur directed at him by a supporter of Nigel Farage's right-wing Reform UK party.

title: 2024's First Hurricane, 'Beryl', Bears Down On Caribbean
content: Much of the southeast Caribbean was on alert Sunday as Beryl strengthened into the first hurricane of the 2024 Atlantic season, with forecasters warning it will swiftly become a major storm.
summary: Much of the southeast Caribbean was on alert Sunday as Beryl strengthened into the first hurricane of the 2024 Atlantic season, with forecasters warning it will swiftly become a major storm.

title: Tristan da Cunha: NASA Shares Pic Of World's Most Remote Inhabited Island
content: NASA added that the pictures taken by Landsat “have been used to locate the forests and plan underwater surveys.”
summary: NASA added that the pictures taken by Landsat “have been used to locate the forests and plan underwater surveys.”

title: Secret Dossier Reveals Queen Elizabeth I's Network Of Spies: Report
content: A document titled "The Names of the Intelligencers" has now disclosed the hidden network of spies of England and Ireland's former Queen Elizabeth I.
summary: A document titled "The Names of the Intelligencers" has now disclosed the hidden network of spies of England and Ireland's former Queen Elizabeth I.

title: Melania Trump's Deal With Donald Trump If He Becomes President
content: Donald Trump, the Republican nominee for the US Presidential poll, has been busy with the 2024 US Election Campaign. But if the 78-year-old becomes the President, he might not see his wife Melania Trump much in action.
summary: Donald Trump, the Republican nominee for the US Presidential poll, has been busy with the 2024 US Election Campaign. But if the 78-year-old becomes the President, he might not see his wife Melania Trump much in action.

title: Video: Israeli Driver Enters Palestine Territory, His Car Is Set On Fire
content: An Israeli citizen mistakenly entered the Palestinian town of Qalandiya, situated between Jerusalem and Ramallah, in West Bank and was soon met with aggression from local residents, leading to a violent confrontation.
summary: An Israeli citizen mistakenly entered the Palestinian town of Qalandiya, situated between Jerusalem and Ramallah, in West Bank and was soon met with aggression from local residents, leading to a violent confrontation.

title: Amid Cancer Battle, Buckingham Palace Releases New Portrait Of King Charles
content: King Charles is adorned in the Field Marshal's uniform, the highest rank in the British Army.
summary: King Charles is adorned in the Field Marshal's uniform, the highest rank in the British Army.

title: UK Elections 2024: Rishi Sunak's India Connection In 10 Points
content: Rishi Sunak scripted history on October 25, 2022, when he became the first Indian-origin Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.
summary: Rishi Sunak scripted history on October 25, 2022, when he became the first Indian-origin Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

title: Rishi Sunak vs Keir Starmer, Who Will Win The 2024 UK Elections?
content: The United Kingdom is preparing to go to polls on July 4, with odds heavily favouring the Labour Party leader Keir Starmer while Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is trying hard to keep his Conservative Party in power, the voter fatigue.
summary: The United Kingdom is preparing to go to polls on July 4, with odds heavily favouring the Labour Party leader Keir Starmer while Prime Minister Rishi Sunak is trying hard to keep his Conservative Party in power, the voter fatigue.

title: Warren Buffett Reveals What Will Happen To His Money After Death
content: Berkshire Hathaway announced on Friday that Mr Buffett is converting around 9,000 Class A shares into over 13 million Class B shares.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway announced on Friday that Mr Buffett is converting around 9,000 Class A shares into over 13 million Class B shares.

title: 18 Killed, 42 Injured In Series Of Suicide Attacks In Nigeria
content: At least 18 people were killed and 19 seriously wounded in a string of suicide attacks in northeastern Nigeria on Saturday, emergency services said.
summary: At least 18 people were killed and 19 seriously wounded in a string of suicide attacks in northeastern Nigeria on Saturday, emergency services said.

title: Russian Strike On Ukraine Kills 7, Zelensky Asks Allies For More Weapons
content: A Russian strike on the south Ukrainian town of Vilniansk killed at least seven people, Kyiv said, in an attack that came hours after Russia said a Ukrainian drone killed five people on its border village.
summary: A Russian strike on the south Ukrainian town of Vilniansk killed at least seven people, Kyiv said, in an attack that came hours after Russia said a Ukrainian drone killed five people on its border village.

title: Rishi Sunak, Wife Offer Prayers At London Temple Ahead Of UK Elections
content: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and wife Akshata Murty on the last weekend of the general election campaign prayed at London's iconic BAPS Swaminarayan Mandir, popularly known as Neasden Temple.
summary: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and wife Akshata Murty on the last weekend of the general election campaign prayed at London's iconic BAPS Swaminarayan Mandir, popularly known as Neasden Temple.

title: "Nothing New, No Real Progress": Hamas Official On Gaza Ceasefire Deal
content: A senior Palestinian Hamas official said Saturday in Beirut that negotiations for an agreement with Israel on a Gaza ceasefire and hostage release deal had not made any progress.
summary: A senior Palestinian Hamas official said Saturday in Beirut that negotiations for an agreement with Israel on a Gaza ceasefire and hostage release deal had not made any progress.

title: 40 Killed, Over 200 Injured In Israeli Attacks On Gaza In 24 Hours
content: At least 40 Palestinians were killed and 224 others injured in Israeli attacks across the besieged Gaza Strip over the past 24 hours, according to health authorities controlled by Hamas.
summary: At least 40 Palestinians were killed and 224 others injured in Israeli attacks across the besieged Gaza Strip over the past 24 hours, according to health authorities controlled by Hamas.

title: Man Attacks Israeli Embassy In Serbia With Crossbow, Shot Dead By Cops
content: A Serbian police officer on Saturday killed a man who shot him in the neck with a crossbow in front of the Israeli embassy in Belgrade, in what the prime minister called a "terrorist act".
summary: A Serbian police officer on Saturday killed a man who shot him in the neck with a crossbow in front of the Israeli embassy in Belgrade, in what the prime minister called a "terrorist act".

title: Israel Minister Says Iran "Deserves To Be Destroyed" For War Threat
content: Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz said on Saturday that Iran's message of an "obliterating war" made it worthy of destruction.
summary: Israeli Foreign Minister Israel Katz said on Saturday that Iran's message of an "obliterating war" made it worthy of destruction.
